publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8090 Mr Frank McAveety: Sporting Success for St Mungo’s—That the Parliament congratulates St Mungo’s Academy on being named Glasgow Secondary Sports School of the Year at the Evening Times Sports Person of the Year Awards; considers that the award is recognition of the important role that sport plays in the development of Scotland’s youngsters, and welcomes what it believes is the deserved recognition that this award bestows on the pupils and staff at St Mungo’s.

S3M-8090 Mr Frank McAveety: Sporting Success for St Mungo’s—That the Parliament congratulates St Mungo’s Academy on being named Glasgow Secondary Sports School of the Year at the Evening Times Sports Person of the Year Awards; considers that the award is recognition of the important role that sport plays in the development of Scotland’s youngsters, and welcomes what it believes is the deserved recognition that this award bestows on the pupils and staff at St Mungo’s.
